InfoSource.Name: 4GuysFromRolla.com
InfoSource.Abstract: 4GuysFromRolla.com is one of the Internet's largest Active Server Pages and .NET resource sites. 4Guys provides advanced developers around the globe with timely articles on the latest Microsoft Web technologies. In addition to publishing articles by some of the biggest names in the business, 4Guys also offers readers one of the largest ASP and .NET discussion forums anywhere.

InfoSource.Name: AspAlliance.com
InfoSource.Abstract: Become an ASP Alliance columnist and share your knowledge with the developer community.

InfoSource.Name: ASP-PHP.net
InfoSource.Abstract: ASP-PHP.NET : Apprendre en douceur les langages majeurs du Web dynamique, ASP, ASP.NET et PHP, puis passer de l'un à l'autre afin de se faire sa propre idée sur leurs avantages et inconvénients respectifs quitte à devenir .NETAsPhPien (ni catégoriquement pour l'un, ni farouchement contre l'autre !)

InfoSource.Name: C# Corner.com
InfoSource.Abstract: C# Corner run by .NET experts and authors is an online community for C# and Microsoft .NET developers to meet and exchange ideas, code, and expertise through discussion forums or submissions.

InfoSource.Name: CodeGuru.com
InfoSource.Abstract: CodeGuru is a community dedicated to helping developers and programmers share technical information. This can be in the form of code, articles, questions, answers, tips, tricks and so much more. CodeGuru contains thousands of articles as well as thousands of pieces of code that you can download, look at, modify, play with, and use. CodeGuru also has a lively discussion forum with over a million posts that focus topics such as C++, VB, .NET, and all things programming.

InfoSource.Name: Codes-Sources - ASPFR.com
InfoSource.Abstract: AspFr is specialized on ASP and ASP.NET technology and his samples of code. It is also one the seventeen web site of CodeS-SourceS network which makes up for over 25,000 samples. More than 50,000 developers visit CodeS-SourceS on a daily basis, using over 200,000 pages per day. This network provides also others services for his members: chat, email, forum and special offers. CodeS-SourceS has become a necessary tool for French speaking developers in need of programming support.

InfoSource.Name: Codes-Sources - CppFrance.com
InfoSource.Abstract: CppFrance is specialized on C++ language and his samples of code. It is also one the seventeen web site of CodeS-SourceS network which makes up for over 25,000 samples. More than 50,000 developers visit CodeS-SourceS on a daily basis, using over 200,000 pages per day. This network provides also others services for his members: chat, email, forum and special offers. CodeS-SourceS has become a necessary tool for French speaking developers in need of programming support.

InfoSource.Name: Codes-Sources - CsharpFr.com
InfoSource.Abstract: CsharpFr is specialized on C# language and his samples of code. It is also one the seventeen web site of CodeS-SourceS network which makes up for over 25,000 samples. More than 50,000 developers visit CodeS-SourceS on a daily basis, using over 200,000 pages per day. This network provides also others services for his members: chat, email, forum and special offers. CodeS-SourceS has become a necessary tool for French speaking developers in need of programming support.

InfoSource.Name: Codes-Sources - PDAFr.com
InfoSource.Abstract: PDAFr is specialized on mobility development and his samples of code. It is also one the seventeen web site of CodeS-SourceS network which makes up for over 25,000 samples. More than 50,000 developers visit CodeS-SourceS on a daily basis, using over 200,000 pages per day. This network provides also others services for his members: chat, email, forum and special offers. CodeS-SourceS has become a necessary tool for French speaking developers in need of programming support.

InfoSource.Name: Codes-Sources - VbFrance.com
InfoSource.Abstract: VBFrance is specialized on Visual Basic language and his samples of code. It is also one the seventeen web site of CodeS-SourceS network which makes up for over 25,000 samples. More than 50,000 developers visit CodeS-SourceS on a daily basis, using over 200,000 pages per day. This network provides also others services for his members: chat, email, forum and special offers. CodeS-SourceS has become a necessary tool for French speaking developers in need of programming support.

InfoSource.Name: Developer Fusion (UK)
InfoSource.Abstract: Developer Fusion is the largest online UK community for developers. Read articles from experts all around the world, with hundreds of tutorials and source code for developers using technologies including .NET, VB, ASP, C++, and plenty more. Learn how to solve that frustrating problem you've faced all day, by posting it on our discussion forums. Interact with other UK developers by reading their blogs and discovering local events to attend, or even plan your next career move by exploring the latest job opportunities. Whatever it is, Developer Fusion's the place to be!

InfoSource.Name: DevTrain.de
InfoSource.Abstract: DevTrain ist das unabhängige deutschsprachige #1 Portal fÜr Microsoft Web Entwickler. Sie finden hier technische Artikel die Ihre Probleme lösen. Über die Foren können sich die User gegenseitig helfen.

InfoSource.Name: DevX.com
InfoSource.Abstract: DevX, the know-how behind application development, is the leading provider of technical information and services that enable corporate application development teams to efficiently conquer development challenges and keep projects moving. We are committed to leading the market by offering customers timely, vital resources and superior services designed to enhance their efforts of applying new technologies and techniques.

InfoSource.Name: DotNet-Developpez.com
InfoSource.Abstract: Developpez.com est le principal site d'entraide des développeurs francophones. Developpez.com apporte aux développeurs une multitude de news, cours, tutoriels, articles, FAQ, outils, composants et exemples de codes rédigés par des rédacteurs bénévoles passionnés, qui désirent partager leurs connaissances. Le forum est largement subdivisé pour répondre au mieux aux activités des différentes technologies et répondre aux attentes des développeurs. Developpez.com a pour vocation d'aider n'importe quel développeur, quelque soit son niveau et le langage de programmation qu'il utilise, mais focalise cependant ses efforts sur la formation et l'aide au professionnels.

InfoSource.Name: DotNetFramework.de
InfoSource.Abstract: dotnetframework.de presents a large encyclopedia of technical terms for Windows software developers. The site is also famous for its reference lists of tools, software components, languages and classes for .NET Framework. In addition, the site provides articles, forums and code samples.

InfoSource.Name: DotNetJunkies.com
InfoSource.Abstract: DotNetJunkies is an independent online community for developers using the Microsoft .Net Framework. Doug Seven and Donny Mack, the site's founders remain intimately involved with this site which is part of CMP Media's Software Development Media Group. The DotNetJunkies site contains articles, how-to's, and one of the biggest independent .Net Blogs!

InfoSource.Name: DotNet-Project.com
InfoSource.Abstract: Dotnet-Project est un espace web où vous pouvez trouver des projets complets et gratuits, et partager vos propres projets.

InfoSource.Name: SQLServerCentral.com
InfoSource.Abstract: SQLServerCentral.com is the largest free SQL Server community on the Internet. With original content published everyday, we have over 2000 articles relating to SQL Server. We also have a very active message board and our famous Question of the Day to help you learn more about SQL Server.

InfoSource.Name: SQLServerFAQ.com
InfoSource.Abstract: The site portal, www.sqlserverfaq.com offers an extensive forum of over 600,000 messages, very large knowledge base including BlogCasts, links, white papers, code samples etc.., we also do online and physical events. The UK SQL Server Community is a group of over 8,500 SQL professionals in the UK, members consist of Developers, Architects, Database Administrators, Consultants to name but a few, the member experience range from novice through to expert. It's a very active community offering members a unique opportunity to help progress their careers and be better at the job.

InfoSource.Name: SqlTeam.com
InfoSource.Abstract: SQLTeam.com caters to SQL Server developers and DBAs. It provides original articles, forums, newsletters and links to relevant SQL Server content. The site is focused on all aspects of SQL Server from design to development to deployment to operations.

InfoSource.Name: SQLIS.com
InfoSource.Abstract: SQLIS.com is dedicated to providing high quality resources, helping you to make the most of your SQL Server Integration Services solutions.

InfoSource.Name: SqlJunkies.com
InfoSource.Abstract: SqlJunkies is an independent online community for developers building solutions with Microsoft SQL Server. Doug Seven and Donny Mack, the site's founders remain intimately involved with this site which is part of CMP Media's Software Development Media Group.

InfoSource.Name: SQL-Server-Performance.com
InfoSource.Abstract: SQL-Server-Performance.Com specializes in providing unique, high-quality information on how users can performance tune and optimize Microsoft SQL Server. In addition, it offers extensive resources on how to cluster SQL Server. The website includes hundreds of tips and articles, along with a very active forum where DBAs and developers can get quick answers to their questions. The website has over 1 millions words on SQL Server, and has been helping the SQL Server community since 2000.

InfoSource.Name: TechHeadBrothers.com
InfoSource.Abstract: Portail d'informations et d'articles techniques sur les technologies Microsoft .NET par Laurent Kempé [ASP.NET MVP] et Mathieu Kempé [C# MVP].

InfoSource.Name: VBCity.com
InfoSource.Abstract: vbCity is a community of VB and .NET developers joined together with a common goal: to learn, teach, and have fun programming. Developers from all over the world come together to share knowledge, source code, and tutorials for free to help their fellow programmers - IT Pros, Hobbyists and Students alike.

InfoSource.Name: FreeAspx
InfoSource.Abstract: FreeAspx.it è una delle più grandi community Italiane dedicate ad ASP.NET, C#, ASP e VB.NET. Oggi FreeAspx.it conta oltre 14000 utenti iscritti alla mailing list e oltre 5000 risorse inserite all’interno del sito. Gli utenti troveranno esempi, articoli e lezioni dedicate ai prodotti Microsoft.
